```{=html}
<style>
.blog-colophon {
    position: fixed;
    bottom: 0;
    left: 50%;
    transform: translateX(-50%);
    z-index: 1000;
    pointer-events: none;
    margin-bottom: 1rem;
}

/* Override for blog page to position colophon after content */
.quarto-listing ~ .blog-colophon {
    position: static;
    transform: none;
    margin: 3rem auto 2rem auto;
    text-align: center;
    pointer-events: auto;
}
</style>

<div class="colophon blog-colophon" id="blog-colophon">
    <img src="/img/ovid4footer.svg" alt="A decorative illustration">
</div>

<script>
// Move colophon to bottom after listing loads
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
    // Function to move colophon
    function moveColophon() {
        const colophon = document.getElementById('blog-colophon');
        const listing = document.getElementById('listing-listing');
        
        if (colophon && listing) {
            // Move colophon after the listing
            listing.parentNode.insertBefore(colophon, listing.nextSibling);
        }
    }
    
    // Try to move immediately
    moveColophon();
    
    // Also try after a short delay to ensure listing is fully loaded
    setTimeout(moveColophon, 100);
    
    // Also try after listing is fully rendered
    if (window.addEventListener) {
        window.addEventListener('load', moveColophon);
    }
});
</script>
```
